Articles.Content:
I joined KSP in 0.16, but played 0.13.3 for about a month prior to that. This brings me to nostalgia.

When it comes to game versions, 0.18 is the mid-level nostalgia. This is when the game really started changing. Anything prior to that is extreme nostalgia, and anything after that and before 0.23 is mildy nostalgic

Have some mild nostalgia.

http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/b/469477983
haha, wow OLD KSP-TV ads. Dahud, the old man of the group (though that's probably not why you posted the video )
I forget, what did .22 add? Might help the nostalgia.

I forget, what did .22 add? Might help the nostalgia.

Science and the tech tree, if I remember correctly.

This does bring the nostalgia, as it was Spootyman's preview of 0.22 where I started watching KSPTV. If I don't miss my guess, this is Yarg's show which was followed by Kofeyh's, and then Spooty's. I would love to watch that episode again, so I am curious how you managed to find this!
looked waaay back in the KSPTV episodes list.

haha, wow OLD KSP-TV ads. Dahud, the old man of the group (though that's probably not why you posted the video )

What's that sonny?
The good old days when they promised budgets.....

The good old days when they promised budgets.....

You do realize that budgets are coming in literally the next update right?

You do realize that budgets are coming in literally the next update right?

Two possibilites:

1.He meant to say resources (and I'd rather not go into that further)

2.They 'promised' budgets--as in, it wasn't happening yet and we were just waiting

Two possibilites:

1.He meant to say resources (and I'd rather not go into that further)

2.They 'promised' budgets--as in, it wasn't happening yet and we were just waiting

Actually, Resources were cancelled on 0.20, I believe.

Actually, Resources were cancelled on 0.20, I believe.

Not cancelled, just delayed. And we'll leave that at that, no need for an argument.

Not cancelled, just delayed. And we'll leave that at that, no need for an argument.

A bit of both i believe. Resources 'As they were' meaning their big fancy flowchart, got the axe because it wasnt fun. So they are prolly doing some thinking on it before they try again. But I agree we dont need another argument about it.

Can anyone find the link for the OLD KSP-TV channel? The one that should have .18 streams? (where docking was revealed)(and Kerbalkon)

EDIT: FOUND IT

Edited June 26, 2014 by RocketPilot573
What was the big change in 0.18, that made that mid-nostalgia?

What was the big change in 0.18, that made that mid-nostalgia?

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Version_history#v0.18.4

In short, we got:

Docking

Maneuver Nodes

All the labels on map view apart from Ap and Pe

Renaming vessels

I think that's when we got the new resources (with transfer and such)

Music

I think that's when we got the new menu (3d models of Mun and Kerbin)

Probes

Action Groups

and a bunch other stuff.

I still remember when I first read Harv's first post on the .18 update, when he showed us progress on being able to click on orbit lines in the map view (required for maneuver nodes) and that maneuver nodes were the big seller. It was a huge improvement from .17 when we had planets but it was very difficult to navigate to them in stock.
I just noticed. I've been playing a whole year, now. Whackjovian KSP cake day!
